name: Simplexety Parameters File
summary: Learn about .SP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When you save an SP file, an .SY file is also saved alongside. You can use either the SP or SY file to reopen content in Simplexety.

description: Data file created by Simplexety, an advanced calculator program used for creating and evaluating mathematical functions as well as creating graphs; saves the list of functions and data and also supports storage of custom VBScript source code; can be used for storing and sharing mathematical data with others.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .sp file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: SP file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
